metadata.title: Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 4

tracks.text: Text, 39, Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 4
Psyger and Sunraku stand in the Lightless Barrens
Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
A woman holds a bow and a man holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge a boy wearing a pirate hat at the wheel of a ship.
A mermaid fights a shark.
Giant octopus arms wrap around a tattered ship
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
Psyger strikes with crimson fire.
Lycagon breaks golden chains, leaps into the air, backflips, and lands across the clearing.
Psyger drives her purple long sword into the ground. An black magic circle forms.
Shadows spread across the ground.
The RNG Goddess smiles and flips him off with both hands.
Lycagon stares at Sunraku
Akane smiles at Sunraku
She puts her hands up to her ears.
The clouds engulf the moon.
She forms a ball of fire that erupts forward. Ryuu Ibuki is spelled dragon + power + storm
The torrent of fire reaches the shadow clone. It screams, consumed by the flames.
Clone leaps form the flames. Bamboo shoots from the ground around Ceecrue, forming a wall. Clone smashes into it and dissipates.
Lycagon Prime roars above crackling flames and charges.
Indicators appear on Sunraku's heads up display.
Lycagon closes the gap. Sunraku runs and leaps.
A crystal shard grows rapidly into Lycagon's face.
Emul shoots and hits Lycagon, who stumbles.
Suzaku marks Lycagon's head
A line on Suzaku's wings glows orange. Its jets engage.
Energy 0
Suzaku took out a majority chunk of Lycagon's right wrist. She falls over.
Her wrist begins to heal.
She struggles to her feet, then falls.
Moon light sparkles against the stars.
The crystal emits golden light.
He leaps
Lycagon roars, baring teeth
He punches a ball of light into Lycagon's open mouth
Waves of light and shock erupt from the collision
The gauntlet crystals shatter
Sunraku is knocked back.
Emul holds onto her hat. Ceecrue closes his eyes. Akane shields her face from the shock wave.
Sunraku's HP drops to 1. Buff, Endure.
Akane watches Sunraku go flying
The chain wraps around his ankle. Ceecrue and Akane grab him.
They cushion his fall as they crash to the ground.
Dark energy whirls around Psyger. Lycagon glares as pixels stream from her face.
Black lightning crackles. Lycagon charges, paw raised.
She raises her sword
Energy swirls around the sword. All wind and debris and light gathers at the tip of the sword, as if it were a black hole.
A plume of smoke and cloud descends towards her. It splits in half and spirals around itself.
The 2 clouds, one white and one black, twist across the landscape. All color vanishes, rendering the land black and white. Brilliant light explodes like an atomic bomb.
The crescent moon is a black shadow across a white void. Sunraku and Akane, now black and white, shield their faces.
Lycagon roars as the force strikes her face.
Shock waves roll across the land. A sphere of darkness expands and explodes into brilliant nothingness.
The smoke begins to clear
Lycagon stares.
Akane's eyes grow wide. Ceecrue and Emul gape.
Psyger falls to the ground, covered in soot.
The right half of Lycagon's face is missing, with the gouge stretching to the shoulder. Her remaining eye looks down.
Purple lightning crackles around Lycagon's remaining eye, which reflects Sunraku's approach. She snarls and narrows her eyes.
Her eyes narrow further, to a single line, and her face dissipates into smoke.
Purple lightning draws the outline of Lycagon's eyes and markings.
The outline floats in the air and stares down at them.
They gape. The outline flickers, warps, and dissipates into blue pixels.
The crescent moon shines.
The wind blows, then stills.
The party stares at the clearing, empty and glittering in moon light.
3 dialogs appear in front of each player. Title Shadow Wolf Revealer acquired. Special Status Guiding Light acquired. Bonus Unique Scenario, Light of Courage Banihsing the Dark, Begin now?
He looks at the phrase "Shadow wolf revealer"
Akane looks at him.
Lycagon's mark begins to glow and smoke.
He remembers the curse description. The curse can be removed through the prayers of a Saint or the defeat of the curse's caster.
The shadows smoking off his curse gather in a ball above him.
He switches to his bird mask.
The shadow ball forms into a cartoon Lycagon
The cartoon chomps on his body. His legs kick.
It chews and swallows him.
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds blue blades and stands in an underwater town.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and a sea side city.
Sunraku runs across an underwater town. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, a woman, Sunraku, Akane, a man, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
A red ship floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. An old man in a black robe. A fox mask. A person in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
